text: some customers' orders make me rethink life choices too lol
gender stereotypes suck even in 'progressive' spots
Academia's got its own old school vibe too
architecture study isn't free from it either - sweeps creative vibes under a rug made outta old norms 😒 gotta hustle harder just because folks cling to outdated ideas instead of actual skills
love grows strong facing life's craziness together
ain't no fairytale finish line when dating 👀 gotta jog side by side every day even if ya trip sometimes
